参数：
section -

commentConfItem

public boolean commentConfItem(java.lang.String section,
                               java.lang.String keyword)
comment one configuration line which contains the keyword in section If multiple lines match, only the first line is commented

参数：
section -
keyword - the keyword appears in the configuration line

unCommentConfItem

public boolean unCommentConfItem(java.lang.String section,
                                 java.lang.String keyword)
uncomment one configuration line which contains the keyword in section If multiple lines match, only the first line is uncommented

参数：
section -
keyword - the keyword appears in the configuration line
